page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: Of those who answered this section of our survey: 114 are Church of England, 15 are Non-Conformist, 9 are Roman Catholic and 7 have other faiths. 11 attend church every Sunday; 37 attend regularly, but not every week; 59 go to church for special occasions such as weddings, baptisms and funerals. 28 never go to church at all. The Rector of Meysey Hampton is also the Rector of Marston Meysey and Castle Eaton but he lives in Meysey Hampton. Meysey Hampton church is over 750 years old. It has a bell tower with a peal of six bells. Inside the door is an alms box dated 1616 which has three locks on it. There used to be a Baptist chapel in Meysey Hampton but it is now a private house.
